# GitHub Actions Status Badges

Add these badges to your README.md to show CI status:

## Code Quality (Lint)

```markdown
![Lint](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/trailglass/actions/workflows/lint.yml/badge.svg)
```

## Main CI (Build & Test)

```markdown
![CI](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/trailglass/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg)
```

## Combined

```markdown
![Lint](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/trailglass/actions/workflows/lint.yml/badge.svg)
![CI](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/trailglass/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg)
```

Replace `YOUR_USERNAME` with your GitHub username or organization name.

## Specific Branch

To show status for a specific branch (e.g., `main`):

```markdown
![Lint](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/trailglass/actions/workflows/lint.yml/badge.svg?branch=main)
![CI](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/trailglass/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg?branch=main)
```
